mapper.select: select id, stock_name, stock_num, begin_price, last_day_end_price, curr_price, day_max_price, day_min_price, buy_one, sell_one, sell_done_num, sell_done_mon, buy_one_num, buy_one_mon, buy_two_num, buy_two_mon, buy_three_num, buy_three_mon, buy_fore_num, buy_fore_mon, buy_five_num, buy_five_mon, sell_one_num, sell_one_mon, sell_two_num, sell_two_mon, sell_three_num, sell_three_mon, sell_fore_num, sell_fore_mon, sell_five_num, sell_five_mon, deal_date, create_time, update_time from stock_table where id = #{id}

select id, stock_name, stock_num, begin_price, last_day_end_price, curr_price, day_max_price, day_min_price, buy_one, sell_one, sell_done_num, sell_done_mon, buy_one_num, buy_one_mon, buy_two_num, buy_two_mon, buy_three_num, buy_three_mon, buy_fore_num, buy_fore_mon, buy_five_num, buy_five_mon, sell_one_num, sell_one_mon, sell_two_num, sell_two_mon, sell_three_num, sell_three_mon, sell_fore_num, sell_fore_mon, sell_five_num, sell_five_mon, deal_date, create_time, update_time from stock_table limit #{offset} , #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into stock_table(stock_name, stock_num, begin_price, last_day_end_price, curr_price, day_max_price, day_min_price, buy_one, sell_one, sell_done_num, sell_done_mon, buy_one_num, buy_one_mon, buy_two_num, buy_two_mon, buy_three_num, buy_three_mon, buy_fore_num, buy_fore_mon, buy_five_num, buy_five_mon, sell_one_num, sell_one_mon, sell_two_num, sell_two_mon, sell_three_num, sell_three_mon, sell_fore_num, sell_fore_mon, sell_five_num, sell_five_mon, deal_date, create_time, update_time) values (#{stockName}, #{stockNum}, #{beginPrice}, #{lastDayEndPrice}, #{currPrice}, #{dayMaxPrice}, #{dayMinPrice}, #{buyOne}, #{sellOne}, #{sellDoneNum}, #{sellDoneMon}, #{buyOneNum}, #{buyOneMon}, #{buyTwoNum}, #{buyTwoMon}, #{buyThreeNum}, #{buyThreeMon}, #{buyForeNum}, #{buyForeMon}, #{buyFiveNum}, #{buyFiveMon}, #{sellOneNum}, #{sellOneMon}, #{sellTwoNum}, #{sellTwoMon}, #{sellThreeNum}, #{sellThreeMon}, #{sellForeNum}, #{sellForeMon}, #{sellFiveNum}, #{sellFiveMon}, #{dealDate}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into stock_table(stock_name, stock_num, begin_price, last_day_end_price, curr_price, day_max_price, day_min_price, buy_one, sell_one, sell_done_num, sell_done_mon, buy_one_num, buy_one_mon, buy_two_num, buy_two_mon, buy_three_num, buy_three_mon, buy_fore_num, buy_fore_mon, buy_five_num, buy_five_mon, sell_one_num, sell_one_mon, sell_two_num, sell_two_mon, sell_three_num, sell_three_mon, sell_fore_num, sell_fore_mon, sell_five_num, sell_five_mon, deal_date, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.stockName}, #{entity.stockNum}, #{entity.beginPrice}, #{entity.lastDayEndPrice}, #{entity.currPrice}, #{entity.dayMaxPrice}, #{entity.dayMinPrice}, #{entity.buyOne}, #{entity.sellOne}, #{entity.sellDoneNum}, #{entity.sellDoneMon}, #{entity.buyOneNum}, #{entity.buyOneMon}, #{entity.buyTwoNum}, #{entity.buyTwoMon}, #{entity.buyThreeNum}, #{entity.buyThreeMon}, #{entity.buyForeNum}, #{entity.buyForeMon}, #{entity.buyFiveNum}, #{entity.buyFiveMon}, #{entity.sellOneNum}, #{entity.sellOneMon}, #{entity.sellTwoNum}, #{entity.sellTwoMon}, #{entity.sellThreeNum}, #{entity.sellThreeMon}, #{entity.sellForeNum}, #{entity.sellForeMon}, #{entity.sellFiveNum}, #{entity.sellFiveMon}, #{entity.dealDate}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into stock_table(stock_name, stock_num, begin_price, last_day_end_price, curr_price, day_max_price, day_min_price, buy_one, sell_one, sell_done_num, sell_done_mon, buy_one_num, buy_one_mon, buy_two_num, buy_two_mon, buy_three_num, buy_three_mon, buy_fore_num, buy_fore_mon, buy_five_num, buy_five_mon, sell_one_num, sell_one_mon, sell_two_num, sell_two_mon, sell_three_num, sell_three_mon, sell_fore_num, sell_fore_mon, sell_five_num, sell_five_mon, deal_date, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.stockName}, #{entity.stockNum}, #{entity.beginPrice}, #{entity.lastDayEndPrice}, #{entity.currPrice}, #{entity.dayMaxPrice}, #{entity.dayMinPrice}, #{entity.buyOne}, #{entity.sellOne}, #{entity.sellDoneNum}, #{entity.sellDoneMon}, #{entity.buyOneNum}, #{entity.buyOneMon}, #{entity.buyTwoNum}, #{entity.buyTwoMon}, #{entity.buyThreeNum}, #{entity.buyThreeMon}, #{entity.buyForeNum}, #{entity.buyForeMon}, #{entity.buyFiveNum}, #{entity.buyFiveMon}, #{entity.sellOneNum}, #{entity.sellOneMon}, #{entity.sellTwoNum}, #{entity.sellTwoMon}, #{entity.sellThreeNum}, #{entity.sellThreeMon}, #{entity.sellForeNum}, #{entity.sellForeMon}, #{entity.sellFiveNum}, #{entity.sellFiveMon}, #{entity.dealDate}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update stock_name = values(stock_name) , stock_num = values(stock_num) , begin_price = values(begin_price) , last_day_end_price = values(last_day_end_price) , curr_price = values(curr_price) , day_max_price = values(day_max_price) , day_min_price = values(day_min_price) , buy_one = values(buy_one) , sell_one = values(sell_one) , sell_done_num = values(sell_done_num) , sell_done_mon = values(sell_done_mon) , buy_one_num = values(buy_one_num) , buy_one_mon = values(buy_one_mon) , buy_two_num = values(buy_two_num) , buy_two_mon = values(buy_two_mon) , buy_three_num = values(buy_three_num) , buy_three_mon = values(buy_three_mon) , buy_fore_num = values(buy_fore_num) , buy_fore_mon = values(buy_fore_mon) , buy_five_num = values(buy_five_num) , buy_five_mon = values(buy_five_mon) , sell_one_num = values(sell_one_num) , sell_one_mon = values(sell_one_mon) , sell_two_num = values(sell_two_num) , sell_two_mon = values(sell_two_mon) , sell_three_num = values(sell_three_num) , sell_three_mon = values(sell_three_mon) , sell_fore_num = values(sell_fore_num) , sell_fore_mon = values(sell_fore_mon) , sell_five_num = values(sell_five_num) , sell_five_mon = values(sell_five_mon) , deal_date = values(deal_date) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update stock_table
stock_name = #{stockName},
stock_num = #{stockNum},
begin_price = #{beginPrice},
last_day_end_price = #{lastDayEndPrice},
curr_price = #{currPrice},
day_max_price = #{dayMaxPrice},
day_min_price = #{dayMinPrice},
buy_one = #{buyOne},
sell_one = #{sellOne},
sell_done_num = #{sellDoneNum},
sell_done_mon = #{sellDoneMon},
buy_one_num = #{buyOneNum},
buy_one_mon = #{buyOneMon},
buy_two_num = #{buyTwoNum},
buy_two_mon = #{buyTwoMon},
buy_three_num = #{buyThreeNum},
buy_three_mon = #{buyThreeMon},
buy_fore_num = #{buyForeNum},
buy_fore_mon = #{buyForeMon},
buy_five_num = #{buyFiveNum},
buy_five_mon = #{buyFiveMon},
sell_one_num = #{sellOneNum},
sell_one_mon = #{sellOneMon},
sell_two_num = #{sellTwoNum},
sell_two_mon = #{sellTwoMon},
sell_three_num = #{sellThreeNum},
sell_three_mon = #{sellThreeMon},
sell_fore_num = #{sellForeNum},
sell_fore_mon = #{sellForeMon},
sell_five_num = #{sellFiveNum},
sell_five_mon = #{sellFiveMon},
deal_date = #{dealDate},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where stock_num = #{stockNum}
